dict.acceptation: 歌曲；歌唱（艺术）；诗歌，韵文；鸟叫声，鸟语；

sent.orig: The morphological relation between "sing" and "singer" and "song" is derivational.
sent.trans: 从形态关系上看，“sing”、“singer”和“song”都是由同一个词派生出来的。

sent.orig: In view of the singing manners, there are single-part song, two-part song, threpocket part song, etc.
sent.trans: 从歌唱方法分有单声部、二声部、三声部等。

sent.orig: Have you been meeting Song Jialin lately?Have you met Song Jialin lately?
sent.trans: 你近来常见到宋佳霖吗？你近来见到过宋佳霖吗？

sent.orig: Song Dynasty was the military song and dance.
Alphabet song, under the name of every song starts with a Pinyin letter to select songs.
sent.trans: 拼音点歌，根据歌曲名称的每一个汉字拼音打头的字母来选歌。
